attributes.action: Remove "Bank Official" from the list of poeple who can countersign a passport
attributes.additional_details:
The current list of poeple who can countersign a passport includes "Bank / Building Society Official" with many honourable professions.

In view of the disgraceful way many bank officials have behaved over recent years it would seem reasonable to remove them from the list.

If this petition fails then a further petition should be raised to ask the other people on the list if they wish to be associated with "Bank Officials" in this way.
